title: Cant click on clubs tab
body: Idk why but I cant do anything with clubs I cant even click on the tabs and I haven't gotten reported or anything that I know of cause I haven't been "Toxic" or anything. my friends cant even invite me yes I have verified my account

replies.body: I'm looking at your profile right now and it seems like something might be a little wonky if you did have previous clubs on this account. It looks like your current friends were added pretty recently, and I'm wondering if club invites work off the same principle as gifting friends, in that you need to be friends for at least 24 hours before you can send a gift/invite.
But I cant even click on the tab at all
